name: Game Character
description: Character creator and manager for isometric games. Connect to sprite widgets for appearance, configure animations, and deploy to game maps.
author: StickerNest

setSpriteData.description: Set character sprite from sprite widget

setProperties.description: Set character properties {name, color, skinColor, speed}

playAnimation.description: Play animation by name (walk_n, walk_s, idle, etc.)

setDirection.description: Set facing direction (n, s, e, w, ne, nw, se, sw)

characterData.description: Complete character data for use in isometric grid
